name: Dates Near Me
tag_list: dates-near-me, dating, mobile-dating, free-mobile-dating, iphone-dating, dating-application, google-android-dating
description: Free Location Based Mobile Dating App
overview:
Dates Near Me is a mobile dating app, that is 100% Free and full of features. Our app uses GPS technology that allows you to flirt with singles around your location to find your perfect date. We have a strong emphasis on Privacy and Security, and are known for conveniently connecting right matches.

Why Dates Near Me is the best mobile dating app:

  • 100% Free. No charges or catches.
  • Highest level of privacy and security settings. Flirt with comfort.
  • Find singles around you with our Map view or List view.
  • Full of features with high user friendliness.
  • Easy and fast to create your profile. Only a few clicks if you update from Facebook.
  • Easily flirt with hotties with winks and live messages.
  • Add users to your Hot List, and see who has added you to theirs.

Why our Privacy and Security features are so advanced:

  • You can hide your photos and choose who to show it to.
  • Only mobile devices can access our app, so everyoneâ€™s general location is genuine. Hence, creeps cannot pretend they are at a nearby place while actually on a PC elsewhere.
  • You can hide your position on the map view. You can also automatically hide if app is inactive.
  • You can block users.
  • You can report users, which we monitor to quickly remove pervs, fakes and frauds.

Find a date or more in your area now.
